message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, even at that price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand your product has a high value to you, but I'm only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is really the lowest I'm willing to go right now.  This product has a lot of value and I'm confident you'll see that once you start using it.
